str2: But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.

str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To hate, detest, love less, esteem less. From a primary misos; to detest; by extension, to love less.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From a primary ergo; toil; by implication, an act.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A Nicolaitan, possibly a follower of Nicolaus (a heretic at Ephesus). From Nikolaos; a Nicolaite, i.e. Adherent of Nicolaus.

str2: To also, I too, but I. From kai and ego; so also the dative case kamoi, and accusative case kame and I, me.
